mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, mobile, login_password, login_pwd_key, pw_security_level, pay_password, pay_pwd_key, avatar_url, direct_inviter_no, indirect_inviter_no, user_status, user_type, invest_flag, invest_user_type, is_newbie, is_open_deposit, is_bind_bank, register_source, register_ip, register_version, source_channel, invite_type, invite_code, gmt_create, gmt_modify, gmt_creator, gmt_modifier, is_del
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from user_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_name, mobile, login_password, login_pwd_key, pw_security_level, pay_password, pay_pwd_key, avatar_url, direct_inviter_no, indirect_inviter_no, user_status, user_type, invest_flag, invest_user_type, is_newbie, is_open_deposit, is_bind_bank, register_source, register_ip, register_version, source_channel, invite_type, invite_code, gmt_create, gmt_modify, gmt_creator, gmt_modifier, is_del) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwSecurityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indirectInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{investFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{investUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isNewbie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOpenDeposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isBindBank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update user_info
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_password = #{record.loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_pwd_key = #{record.loginPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pw_security_level = #{record.pwSecurityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_password = #{record.payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_pwd_key = #{record.payPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar_url = #{record.avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
direct_inviter_no = #{record.directInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
indirect_inviter_no = #{record.indirectInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_status = #{record.userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_type = #{record.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invest_flag = #{record.investFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invest_user_type = #{record.investUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_newbie = #{record.isNewbie,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_open_deposit = #{record.isOpenDeposit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_bind_bank = #{record.isBindBank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register_source = #{record.registerSource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register_ip = #{record.registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_version = #{record.registerVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_channel = #{record.sourceChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_type = #{record.inviteType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invite_code = #{record.inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{record.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_creator = #{record.gmtCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modifier = #{record.gmtModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update user_info set user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_password = #{record.loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_pwd_key = #{record.loginPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pw_security_level = #{record.pwSecurityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_password = #{record.payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_pwd_key = #{record.payPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{record.avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, direct_inviter_no = #{record.directInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, indirect_inviter_no = #{record.indirectInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{record.userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_type = #{record.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invest_flag = #{record.investFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invest_user_type = #{record.investUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_newbie = #{record.isNewbie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_open_deposit = #{record.isOpenDeposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_bind_bank = #{record.isBindBank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_source = #{record.registerSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_ip = #{record.registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_version = #{record.registerVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_channel = #{record.sourceChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_type = #{record.inviteType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invite_code = #{record.inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{record.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_creator = #{record.gmtCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modifier = #{record.gmtModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_info
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_password = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_pwd_key = #{loginPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pw_security_level = #{pwSecurityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_password = #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_pwd_key = #{payPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
direct_inviter_no = #{directInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
indirect_inviter_no = #{indirectInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invest_flag = #{investFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invest_user_type = #{investUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_newbie = #{isNewbie,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_open_deposit = #{isOpenDeposit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_bind_bank = #{isBindBank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register_source = #{registerSource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_version = #{registerVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_channel = #{sourceChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_type = #{inviteType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_creator = #{gmtCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modifier = #{gmtModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_info set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_password = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_pwd_key = #{loginPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pw_security_level = #{pwSecurityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_password = #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_pwd_key = #{payPwdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, direct_inviter_no = #{directInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, indirect_inviter_no = #{indirectInviterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invest_flag = #{investFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invest_user_type = #{investUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_newbie = #{isNewbie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_open_deposit = #{isOpenDeposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_bind_bank = #{isBindBank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_source = #{registerSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_version = #{registerVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_channel = #{sourceChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_type = #{inviteType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_creator = #{gmtCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modifier = #{gmtModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ui.user_id, ( ( SELECT count(1) FROM borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.STATUS IN(1,2,5) AND bt.user_id = ui.user_id ) + ( SELECT count(1) FROM borrow_choiceness_tender bct WHERE bct.STATUS IN(1,4) AND bct.user_id = ui.user_id ) ) AS invest_times,-- 投资次数 ( ( SELECT SUM(bt.account) FROM borrow_tender bt WHERE bt.STATUS IN(1,2,5) AND bt.user_id = ui.user_id ) + ( SELECT SUM(bct.pre_account) FROM borrow_choiceness_tender bct WHERE bct.STATUS IN(1,4) AND bct.user_id = ui.user_id ) ) AS invest_total,-- 投资总额 SUM(oir.direct_cashback) AS total_direct_cash, SUM(oir.indirect_cashback) AS total_indirect_cash, SUM(oir.vouchers) AS vouchers,-- 抵用券总额 ui.mobile AS user_phone, ( SELECT o.mobile FROM user_info o WHERE o.user_id = ui.direct_inviter_no ) AS invite_person, ui.invite_type AS invite_register_type, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_info u WHERE u.invite_code = ui.invite_code ) AS invite_person_num FROM user_info ui LEFT JOIN op_invite_record oir ON ui.user_id = oir.user_id GROUP BY ui.mobile
